00020 NATIVEROUTEFINDERS_API HRESULT AStarFindRoute(POINT startPoint, POINT endPoint, 
00021                                                                                           SIZE fieldSize, SIZE resolution, 
00022                                                                                           SIZE movingObjectSize, int objectClearance,
00023                                                                                           PositionedObject* opponents, int opponentsCount,
00024                                                                                           POINT* routeResult, unsigned int routeResultLength, bool useSqrt)
00025 {
00026         // Prevent any divide by zero errors
00027         if (resolution.cx < 1 || resolution.cy < 1)
00028                 return E_INVALIDARG;
00029 
00030         // Calculate the number of squares in the grid
00031         SIZE gridSize;
00032         gridSize.cx = fieldSize.cx / resolution.cx;
00033         gridSize.cy = fieldSize.cy / resolution.cy;
00034 
00035         // Create the grid as an array (for speed of access)
00036         auto grid = new GridSquare*[gridSize.cx * gridSize.cy];
00037 
00038         InitGrid(startPoint, endPoint, fieldSize, resolution, gridSize, grid, objectClearance, movingObjectSize, opponents, opponentsCount);
00039 
00040         vector<GridSquare*> openSet;
00041         vector<GridSquare*> closedSet;
00042         map<GridSquare*, GridSquare*> cameFrom;
00043 
00044         // Would rather do this in parallel, but concurrent_vector doesn't allow you to remove things,
00045         // which makes later things more awkward.
00046         for_each(grid, grid + gridSize.cx * gridSize.cy, [=,&openSet](GridSquare* square)
00047         {
00048                 if (square->Type != Origin)
00049                         return;
00050                 square->KnownScore = 0;
00051                 square->HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(square, endPoint, useSqrt);
00052                 openSet.push_back(square);
00053         });
00054 
00055         while (!openSet.empty())
00056         {
00057                 auto smallestSquare = min_element(openSet.begin(), openSet.end(), [](GridSquare* square1, GridSquare* square2) { return square1->GetTotalScore() < square2->GetTotalScore(); });
00058 
00059                 auto square = (*smallestSquare);
00060                 if (square->Type == Destination)
00061                 {
00062                         unique_ptr<vector<POINT>> path = ReconstructPath(&cameFrom, cameFrom[square]);
00063                         path->push_back(square->Location);
00064                         if (path->size() > routeResultLength)
00065                                 return ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER;
00066                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < path->size(); i++)
00067                         {
00068                                 routeResult[i].x = (*path)[i].x * resolution.cx;
00069                                 routeResult[i].y = (*path)[i].y * resolution.cy;
00070                         }
00071                         return ERROR_SUCCESS;
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 openSet.erase(smallestSquare, smallestSquare+1);
00075                 closedSet.push_back(square);
00076 
00077                 auto index = IndexFromPoint(square->Location, gridSize.cx);
00078 
00079                 int neighbourIndexes[] = { index + gridSize.cx + 1, 
00080                                                                   index - gridSize.cx + 1,
00081                                                                   index + gridSize.cx - 1, 
00082                                                                   index - gridSize.cx - 1, index + 1, 
00083                                                               index - 1, 
00084                                                                   index + gridSize.cx, 
00085                                                                   index - gridSize.cx,
00086                                                                   
00087                 }; // BUG: This doesn't detect wrapping on to the next line...
00088 
00089                 for (auto i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00090                 {
00091                         if (neighbourIndexes[i] < 0 || neighbourIndexes[i] >= gridSize.cx * gridSize.cy)
00092                                 continue; // Skip any indexes out of the range of the grid
00093 
00094                         auto neighbour = grid[neighbourIndexes[i]];
00095                         
00096                         if (find(closedSet.begin(), closedSet.end(), neighbour) != closedSet.end())
00097                                 continue;
00098 
00099                         auto tentativeScore = square->KnownScore + CalculateLength(square->Location, neighbour->Location, useSqrt);
00100                         auto tentativeIsBetter = false;
00101 
00102                         if (find(openSet.begin(), openSet.end(), neighbour) == openSet.end())
00103                         {
00104                                 openSet.push_back(neighbour);
00105                                 neighbour->HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(neighbour, endPoint, useSqrt);
00106                                 tentativeIsBetter = true;
00107                         }
00108                         else if (tentativeScore < neighbour->KnownScore)
00109                                 tentativeIsBetter = true;
00110                         else
00111                                 tentativeIsBetter = false;
00112 
00113                         if (tentativeIsBetter)
00114                         {
00115                                 cameFrom[neighbour] = square;
00116                                 neighbour->KnownScore = tentativeScore;
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00121         return E_FAIL;
00122 }

00124 NATIVEROUTEFINDERS_API HRESULT HashMapAStarFindRoute(POINT startPoint, POINT endPoint, 
00125                                                                                           SIZE fieldSize, SIZE resolution, 
00126                                                                                           SIZE movingObjectSize, int objectClearance,
00127                                                                                           PositionedObject* opponents, int opponentsCount,
00128                                                                                           POINT* routeResult, unsigned int routeResultLength, bool useSqrt)

00149         // which makes later things more awkward.

00151         {
00152                 if (square->Type != Origin)
00153                         return;
00154                 square->KnownScore = 0;
00155                 square->HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(square, endPoint, useSqrt);
00156                 openSet.insert(square);
00157         });

00173                                 routeResult[i].y = (*path)[i].y * resolution.cy;
00174                         }
00175                         return ERROR_SUCCESS;
00176                 }
00177

00179                 closedSet.insert(square);

00184                                                                   index - gridSize.cx + 1,
00185                                                                   index + gridSize.cx - 1, 
00186                                                                   index - gridSize.cx - 1, index + 1, 
00187                                                               index - 1, 
00188                                                                   index + gridSize.cx, 
00189                                                                   index - gridSize.cx,
00190                                                                   
00191                 }; // BUG: This doesn't detect wrapping on to the next line...
00192 
00193                 for (auto i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00194                 {
00195                         if (neighbourIndexes[i] < 0 || neighbourIndexes[i] >= gridSize.cx * gridSize.cy)
00196                                 continue; // Skip any indexes out of the range of the grid
00197 
00198                         auto neighbour = grid[neighbourIndexes[i]];
00199                         
00200                         if (closedSet.find(neighbour) != closedSet.end())
00201                                 continue;
00202 
00203                         auto tentativeScore = square->KnownScore + CalculateLength(square->Location, neighbour->Location, useSqrt);
00204                         auto tentativeIsBetter = false;
00205 
00206                         if (openSet.find(neighbour) == openSet.end())
00207                         {
00208                                 openSet.insert(neighbour);
00209                                 neighbour->HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(neighbour, endPoint, useSqrt);
00210                                 tentativeIsBetter = true;
00211                         }
00212                         else if (tentativeScore < neighbour->KnownScore)
00213                                 tentativeIsBetter = true;
00214                         else
00215                                 tentativeIsBetter = false;
00216 
00217                         if (tentativeIsBetter)
00218                         {
00219                                 cameFrom[neighbour] = square;
00220                                 neighbour->KnownScore = tentativeScore;
00221                         }
00222                 }
00223         }
00224 
00225         return E_FAIL;

00227 
00228 void InitGrid(POINT startPoint, POINT endPoint, SIZE fieldSize, SIZE resolution, SIZE gridSize, 
00229                           GridSquare** grid, int objectClearance, SIZE movingObjectSize, 
00230                           PositionedObject* opponents, int opponentsCount)
00231 {
00232         // The number of elements in the grid array
00233         const int gridLength = gridSize.cx * gridSize.cy;
00234 
00235         SIZE playerSize;
00236         playerSize.cx = (LONG)ceil((float)(movingObjectSize.cx + objectClearance) / (resolution.cx * objectClearance));
00237         playerSize.cy = (LONG)ceil((float)(movingObjectSize.cy + objectClearance) / (resolution.cy * objectClearance));
00238 
00239         auto clearance = max(playerSize.cx,playerSize.cy);
00240 
00241         parallel_for(0, gridLength, [=](int i) { grid[i] = new GridSquare(); grid[i]->Location = PointFromIndex(i, gridSize.cx); });
00242 
00243         parallel_for(0, opponentsCount, [=](int i) { 
00244                 auto opponent = opponents[i];
00245 
00246                 POINT centerGridPoint;
00247                 centerGridPoint.x = (LONG)(floorf((float)opponent.Position.x / resolution.cx));
00248                 centerGridPoint.y = (LONG)(floorf((float)opponent.Position.y / resolution.cy));
00249 
00250                 auto minX = max(0, centerGridPoint.x - playerSize.cx - clearance);
00251                 auto maxX = min(centerGridPoint.x + playerSize.cx + clearance, gridSize.cx);
00252                 auto minY = max(0, centerGridPoint.y - playerSize.cy - clearance);
00253                 auto maxY = min(centerGridPoint.y + playerSize.cy + clearance, gridSize.cy);
00254 
00255                 for (auto i = minX; i < maxX; i++)
00256                 {
00257                         for (auto j = minY; j < maxY; j++)
00258                         {
00259                                 grid[IndexFromPoint(i, j, gridSize.cx)]->Type = Obstacle;
00260                         }
00261                 }
00262         });
00263 
00264         
00265         auto gridEndX = (LONG)floorf((float)endPoint.x / resolution.cx);
00266         auto gridEndY = (LONG)floorf((float)endPoint.y / resolution.cy);
00267 
00268         grid[IndexFromPoint(gridEndX, gridEndY, gridSize.cx)]->Type = Destination;
00269 
00270         auto gridStartX = (LONG)floorf((float)startPoint.x / resolution.cx);
00271         auto gridStartY = (LONG)floorf((float)startPoint.y / resolution.cy);
00272 
00273         grid[IndexFromPoint(gridStartX, gridStartY, gridSize.cx)]->Type = Origin;
00274 }

00281 //      return (float)sqrt((double)xLength*xLength + yLength*yLength);

00283 
00284 float CalculateLength(POINT startPoint, POINT endPoint, bool useSqrt)
00285 {
00286         auto xLength = startPoint.x - endPoint.x;
00287         auto yLength = startPoint.y - endPoint.y;
00288 
00289         double val = xLength*xLength + yLength*yLength;
00290 
00291         if (useSqrt)
00292                 val = sqrt(val);
00293         return (float)val;
00294 }
00295 
00296 float CalculateHeuristic(GridSquare* square, POINT endPoint, bool useSqrt)
00297 {
00298         if (square->Type == Obstacle)
00299                 return numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
00300         return CalculateLength(square->Location, endPoint, useSqrt);
00301 }
00302 
00303 unique_ptr<vector<POINT>> ReconstructPath(map<GridSquare*, GridSquare*>* cameFrom, GridSquare* currentSquare)
00304 {
00305         if (cameFrom->find(currentSquare) != cameFrom->end())
00306         {
00307                 auto path = ReconstructPath(cameFrom, cameFrom->at(currentSquare));
00308                 path->push_back(currentSquare->Location);
00309                 return path;
00310         }
00311         unique_ptr<vector<POINT>> path(new vector<POINT>());
00312         path->push_back(currentSquare->Location);
00313         return path;
00314 }
